slides.title: Rating user story : Rate routines fa
slides.originalNotes:
Rating user story : Rate routines
A rate routine defines the algorithm used for calculating the rate for coverages, taxes, and other costs on a policy. A rating routine uses the rating algorithm in discreet units, usually by coverage.

Rate routine can have steps with:

1) Mathematical operators, conditionals, and assignments that work on rate table lookups
2) Gosu function calls and policy data.
slides.notes:

slides.title: Rate routine structure
slides.originalNotes:
Rate routine structure
You use rate routines to implement rating algorithms that calculate the properties of the cost for coverages, taxes, and other costs on a policy. The cost properties include the base and adjusted rates, and term amount. You can also create rate routines that do not calculate these properties. These of rate routine types may set up rating information for use by another rate routine. Rate routines are included in a rate book and can be created and edited outside the rate book.
slides.notes:
Rate routine structure
You use rate routines to implement rating algorithms that calculate the properties of the cost for coverages, taxes, and other costs on a policy. The cost properties include the base and adjusted rates, and term amount. You can also create rate routines that do not calculate these properties. These of rate routine types may set up rating information for use by another rate routine. Rate routines are included in a rate book and can be created and edited outside the rate book.
slides.ocrText:
| Rate routine structure i

• Arate routine has one or more
instruction that makes up the rating
algorithm

* Each instruction is made up of one or
more steps

• The rate routine steps may include
mathematical operators, conditionals
and assignments that work on the
rate table lookups

slides.title: Parameter sets and the rate routine
slides.originalNotes:
Parameter sets and the rate routine
A parameter set enables users to define the information available for use within a rate routine.

Each rate routine uses a parameter set

Parameter sets determine the contextual information that is passed to a rate routine at run-time

Parameter sets can be defined for a policy line or remain generic
slides.notes:
